Detailed Description

Containers of intersection of MGObject subclasses, MGCurve, MGFSurface, MGLoop, MGShell, etc.

Function Documentation

std::auto_ptr<MGLoop> trim_out_subloop ( const MGLEPoint &  ts,
const MGLEPoint &  te 
)

Get the clone of ts.loop()(==te.loop()), and trim th loop from ts to te.

Function's return value is the trimmed loop.
